humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 8 out of 10 lymph nodes are positive for tumor with extracapsular extension in five of them. According to the new rules provided, N2 indicates metastases in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that eight out of ten (8/10) lymph nodes are positive for tumor with extracapsular extension in five (5) of those. Extracapsular extension is a factor that upstages the N stage. Based on this, the N stage would be N2.
